summary: Banish any out-of combat summons instantly!
descriptionHtml:
Unsummon
by Dreighton


Ever get tired of your thralls? Want to go solo again for a bit, only to realize there is no way to un-summon thralls or any conjured creature? The only way to cancel out a thrall or conjured creature ingame is to kill it by hand. While handy for lvling, it can get tedious.

get Un-summon!

A spell that can be bought at the riverwood traders for about 200 gold that can banish any out of combat target instantly. The spell will be resisted is the summonned creature has his weapon/magic out. costs about 5 mag to cast. Free version costs 5 gold to buy, and 0 mag to cast.

You can also obtain the spell via console;
The Spell\'s ID is XX000D63
The Tome\'s ID is XX000D64
ex: Player.addspell XX000D63 will add the spell. (The XX is the mod index of the mod, 01 for first mod after Skyrim.esm)
you can also do \"help un-summon 0\" (no quotes) to get the exact IDs with mod index.

All credits go to me, Dreighton, and Bethesda for the game and CK.

Install, just place .esp in your data folder, and activate.
author: Dreighton
